traits.name: Bastion
traits.desc:
Your team gains 10 Armor and Magic Resist.

Bastions gain more, and the value doubles in the first 10 seconds of combat.

traits.name: Battle Academia
traits.desc:
Battle Academia champions upgrade their abilities and gain Potential %i:set14AmpIcon%. Potential improves their abilities.

Prismatic: Field 7 Battle Academia champions, then earn 140 points by equipping items on champions.

traits.name: Crystal Gambit
traits.desc:
Kills and losses during player combats earn Gem Power. Every 3 player combats choose to convert Gem Power into rewards or Double Down.

While Double Down is active losses grant 100% more Gem Power, but wins lose 50% Gem Power and cash out immediately.

Gem Power gains increase at stages 3 and 4.

stats.5: AND every ? kills, gain bonus loot and reroll a new kill number. (Kills: ?)
stats.7: 130% rewards. Crystal Gambit units gain 300 %i:scaleHealth% and 15% %i:scaleDA%

traits.name: Duelist
traits.desc: Duelists gain Attack Speed on each attack, stacking up to 12 times.

traits.name: Edgelord
traits.desc: Edgelords gain Omnivamp and Attack Damage. While attacking enemies under 50% Health, they gain 40% Attack Speed.

traits.name: Executioner
traits.desc: Executioners gain Critical Strike Chance and Critical Strike Damage. Their Ability can critically strike.

traits.name: Heavyweight
traits.desc:
Your team gains 100 Health.

Heavyweights gain additional bonus Health, and Attack Damage equal to a percentage of their Health.

traits.name: Juggernaut
traits.desc: Juggernauts gain Durability, increased above 50% health. When a Juggernaut dies, other Juggernauts heal for 10% of their max Health.

traits.name: Luchador
traits.desc:
Luchadors gain bonus Attack Damage.

At 50% health, Luchadors cleanse negative effects, heal, and leap back into the fight, Stunning enemies in a 1-hex radius for 1 seconds.

traits.name: Mentor
traits.desc:
This trait is active only when you have exactly 1 or 4 unique Mentors.

Kobuko: 6% Damage Reduction
Udyr: 8% Attack Damage and Ability Power
Yasuo: 10% Attack Speed
Ryze: Attacks grant 2 bonus Mana

stats.4: Mentors gain all bonuses and upgrade their abilities. Other allies gain nothing.

traits.name: Mighty Mech
traits.desc:
Gain The Mighty Mech. Mighty Mechs heal it for 12% of the damage they deal.

Each Mighty Mech champion's star level increases The Mighty Mech's power.

traits.name: Monster Trainer
traits.desc: Choose which monster Lulu summons to replace her in combat!

traits.name: Prodigy
traits.desc: Your team gains Mana Regen. Prodigies gain more.

stats.5: 1 %i:TFTManaRegen% | 7 %i:TFTManaRegen% | Prodigy abilities heal an ally for 12% of the damage dealt.

traits.name: Protector
traits.desc:
Units gain 5% Durability while shielded.

Once per combat at 50% Health, Protectors shield themselves and their closest ally for a percent of their maximum Health. Shields stack.

traits.name: Rogue Captain
traits.desc:
Twisted Fate upgrades the Crew Ship to deal 15% of it's damage as true damage and draws Bounty Cards each round that grant random rewards.

Bounty Cards get better for each player combat. (Rounds Fielded: ?)

Current Bounty Card:
No active Bounty.

In Choncc's Treasure, Twisted Fate will not draw a Bounty Card until Stage 3-5.

traits.name: Rosemother
traits.desc:
Gain 1/1/8 placeable plants, based on Zyra's star level. Plants in the front two rows grow into durable Grasping Roots, while plants in the back two rows grow into Deadly Spines.

Rosemother plants benefit from Zyra's Ability Power and Attack Speed.

When Zyra casts, her plant restores 35% Health and gains 35% Attack Speed for the rest of combat. If the plant is dead, she revives it instead.

traits.name: Assassin
traits.desc:
Innate: Leap to the enemy backline when combat starts.

Assassins gain Critical Strike Chance and Critical Strike Damage. Their Ability can critically strike.

traits.name: Astral
traits.desc:
After each player combat, gain an Astral Orb. The total star level of your Astral champions increases the orb quality.

Astral champions gain Ability Power.

traits.name: Bard
traits.desc:
Allies that survive player combat have a 2% chance to create a Doot. Bard always creates a Doot when dancing.

Each Doot you collect increases your Shop odds for higher-tier champions by 1%.

traits.name: Bruiser
traits.desc: Your team gains Health. Bruisers gain double.

traits.name: Cannoneer
traits.desc: Every 5th attack fires a cannon shot that explodes for physical damage around the target. Damage increases with Base Attack Damage.

traits.name: Cavalier
traits.desc:
Innate: Charge quickly towards their target whenever they move.

Cavaliers gain Armor and Magic Resist. At the start of combat and after each charge, gain 200% of this bonus for 4 seconds.

traits.name: Darkflight
traits.desc:
Summon a sacrificial altar. Combat start: the unit placed on the altar is sacrificed, granting a copy of one of its items and Health to each Darkflight champion.

Emblems and non-craftable items are corrupted when they're copied, instead becoming Darkflight Essence.

traits.name: Dragonmancer
traits.desc: Use the Dragonmancer Blessing item to choose a Hero. The Hero gains massively increased Health and Ability Power, which increases by 20% per star level of your Dragonmancers.

traits.name: Dragon
traits.desc:
Innate: Require 2 team slots.

Dragons provide +3 to the marked trait and gain additional bonuses.

stats.6: and your Dragons ascend! 300 %i:scaleHealth%, 30 %i:scaleArmor% and %i:scaleMR%, 30 Attack Damage, 30 Ability Power, 30% Attack Speed

traits.name: Evoker
traits.desc: Evokers gain Mana whenever an ally or enemy casts an Ability.

traits.name: Guardian
traits.desc: Once per combat at 50% Health, Guardians Shield themselves and their closest ally for a percent of their maximum Health. Shields stack!

traits.name: Guild
traits.desc:
Grant a unique bonus to your team; Guild members gain double the amount. Increases for each Guild member in play!

Sejuani: Gain Health
Twitch: Gain Attack Speed
Zippy: Gain Armor and Magic Resist
Jayce: Gain Attack Damage and Ability Power
Bard: Mana per attack
Emblem: Omnivamp

traits.name: Jade
traits.desc:
Summon movable Jade Statues.

Combat Start: Allies who start combat adjacent to a statue restore maximum Health every 2 seconds and gain Attack Speed. When a statue is destroyed, it deals 33% of its Health as magic damage to nearby enemies.

traits.name: Lagoon
traits.desc:
Summon a Seastone which grants loot as Lagoon champions cast Abilities. Lagoon champions gain Ability Power and Attack Speed.

Total casts: ?
Gold granted: ?
Rewards granted: ?

stats.12: 200% %i:scaleAP%, 200% %i:scaleAS%. Casts count extra and grant extra loot.

traits.name: Mage
traits.desc: Mages cast their Abilities twice and have modified total %i:scaleAP% Ability Power.

traits.name: Mirage
traits.desc:
Mirage champions gain a different Trait bonus from game to game.

Electric Overload: When attacking or being hit by an attack, Mirage units gain a chance to deal 9% of their maximum Health as magic damage to adjacent enemies.

(2) 20%
(4) 33%
(6) 50%
(8) 100%
―
Warlord's Honor: After winning any combat, gain bonus Health and Ability Power.
Increases by 10% per win, stacks up to 5 times!

(2) 150 %i:scaleHealth%; 18% %i:scaleAP%
(4) 300 %i:scaleHealth%; 33% %i:scaleAP%
(6) 500 %i:scaleHealth%; 50% %i:scaleAP%
(8) 750 %i:scaleHealth%; 75% %i:scaleAP%
―
Dawnbringer's Determination: Once per combat, rapidly heal at 50% Health.

(2) Heal 40% maximum Health
(4) Heal 65% %i:scaleHealth%
(6) Heal 65% %i:scaleHealth%; heal a 2nd time
(8) Heal 110% %i:scaleHealth%; heal a 2nd time
―
Duelist's Dexterity:
Innate: Mirage units move faster.

Attacks grant bonus Attack Speed, up to 10 stacks.

(2) 6% %i:scaleAS%
(4) 12% %i:scaleAS%
(6) 20% %i:scaleAS%
(8) 30% %i:scaleAS% and 12% %i:scaleDR%
―
Spellsword's Enchantment: Attacks grant Ability Power for the rest of combat.

(2) 5% %i:scaleAP%
(4) 8% %i:scaleAP%
(6) 12% %i:scaleAP%
(8) 20% %i:scaleAP%
―
Pirate's Greed: Gain a chest of loot after each player combat.

(2) Gain a deckhand's chest.
(4) Gain a lieutenant's chest.
(6) Gain a captain's chest.
(8) Gain an admiral's chest.

traits.name: Monolith
traits.desc: Terra empowers (3/3/All) hexes on the battlefield. Combat start: units standing in the hex at the start of combat gain 18% Durability.

traits.name: Mystic
traits.desc: Your team gains Magic Resist.

traits.name: Prodigy
traits.desc:
Nomsy gains a random trait each game. She summons a former Trainer to aid her in battle, who also gains this trait.

Trainers' Ability Power is always equal to Nomsy's Ability Power. When Nomsy dies, Trainers gain 100% Attack Speed.

traits.name: Ragewing
traits.desc:
Innate: Convert Mana to Rage; attacks generate 15 Rage. After casting an Ability, enrage for 4 seconds: 25% Attack Speed but can't gain Rage.

Gain Attack Speed and Omnivamp when enraged:

Ragewings don't gain base mana per attack nor mana from taking damage.

traits.name: Scalescorn
traits.desc: Scalescorns deal a percent of their damage as bonus magic damage. They also take 15% reduced damage from enemies with more than 1900 Health.

traits.name: Shapeshifter
traits.desc: Gain Health after transforming from an Ability.

traits.name: Shimmerscale
traits.desc: Gain unique Shimmerscale items.

stats.3: Random Shimmerscale item or Orb of Greed
stats.7: Random Shimmerscale item and Random Shimmerscale item

traits.name: Spell Thief
traits.desc: Zoe nabs a new Ability after each cast and at the start of every round.

traits.name: Starcaller
traits.desc: The first Starcaller to cast their Ability during player combat heals you for (2/3/75) Tactician damage, depending on their star level. Excess healing disintegrates an enemy champion.

traits.name: Swiftshot
traits.desc:
Innate: Gain +2 Attack Range.

Swiftshots gain Attack Speed for each hex between themselves and their target.

traits.name: Tempest
traits.desc: After 8 seconds, lightning strikes the battlefield, dealing true damage to enemies, Stunning them for 1 second, and granting Tempest champions Damage Amp for the rest of combat.

traits.name: Warrior
traits.desc: Warrior attacks have a 50% chance to increase the damage of their next attack.

traits.name: Whispers
traits.desc:
Damage shrinks enemies, applying 20% Shred, Sunder for 6 seconds. When Whispers damage a shrunken enemy, Whispers gain stacking Attack Damage and Ability Power:

Shred: Reduce Magic Resist
Sunder: Reduce Armor

traits.name: Sniper
traits.desc: Snipers gain Damage Amp, increased against targets farther away.

traits.name: Sorcerer
traits.desc:
Sorcerers gain bonus Ability Power.

When an enemy dies after being damaged by a Sorcerer, they deal a percentage of that enemy's maximum Health to another enemy.

traits.name: Soul Fighter
traits.desc:
Soul Fighters gain bonus Health, and gain Attack Damage and Ability Power every second up to 8 stacks. At max stacks deal bonus true damage.

Prismatic: Field 8, then win 10 combats.

traits.name: Stance Master
traits.desc: When you field Lee Sin, choose between Duelist Stance, Executioner Stance, and Juggernaut Stance! Each stance has a unique ability, and grants Lee Sin the associated trait.

traits.name: Star Guardian
traits.desc:
Star Guardians have a unique Teamwork bonus that is granted to all Star Guardians. Every Star Guardian fielded increases the bonus!

Prismatic: Field 8, then spend 16000 mana.

Rell: Gain shields
Syndra: Gain Ability Power
Xayah: Magic damage on attack
Ahri: On cast, gain Mana
Neeko: Increase heals & shields
Poppy: Heal at low Health
Jinx: Gain Attack Speed
Seraphine: Gain every stat
Emblem: Increase other bonuses

traits.name: Strategist
traits.desc: Combat Start: Allies in the front 2 rows gain a shield for 15 seconds. Allies in the back 2 rows gain Damage Amp. Strategists gain triple.

traits.name: Supreme Cells
traits.desc:
The Cell who dealt the most damage last combat is Supreme. When the Supreme Cell dies, the Cell with the highest current damage becomes Supreme.

Cells gain Damage Amp. The Supreme Cell gains more and executes enemies under 10% Health.

traits.name: The Champ
traits.desc:
The Champ's victories against players grant Poro-fans equal to his star level. On loss, Poro-fans prevent 1 Tactician damage each, then lose all of your Poro-fans.

Poro Fanbase: ?

traits.name: The Crew
traits.desc:
Crew champions gain 5% Health and Attack Speed for each Crew member fielded.

Every 3-star Crew champion grants an additional bonus.

(1x ☆☆☆): +1 XP per paid reroll, and Crew unit odds never drop with player level.
(2x ☆☆☆): +1 free reroll / round.
(3x ☆☆☆): Deal 280 damage to fire a rocket dealing 75.
(4x ☆☆☆): Fire rockets 2.5% more often per player level.
(5x ☆☆☆): Fire the Planet Cracker.

traits.name: Wraith
traits.desc:
Every 4 seconds, the Shadow Realm strikes the 3 closest enemies, dealing total magic damage equal to a portion of damage dealt by Wraiths since the last trigger.

Your lowest health Wraith heals for 18% of damage dealt by Wraiths and the Shadow Realm.
